text: This is the filmography of former Indian actress and Politician J. Jayalalithaa who has acted in over 140 films. ==Filmography== List of Best Actress awards for J. Jayalalithaa Award Wins Nominations ;Tamil Nadu State Film Award for Best Actresss ;Tamil Nadu Cinema Fan Award for Best Actress.. ;Filmfare Award for Best Actress - Tamils ;Filmfare Award for Best Actress – Telugu ;Russian Film festival ;Madras Film Association Awards for Best Actress Key Denotes films that have not yet been released ===1950's=== Year Film Language Role Notes 1957 Mayabazar Tamil Telugu As younger Vatsala's friend ===1960s=== Year Film Language Role Notes 1961 Epistle English Debut in English 1961 Sri Shaila Mahathme Kannada Debut in Kannada as a child 1962 Man-Mauji Hindi Lord Krishna Debut in Hindi as Child.
